channel.title: Jason Alan Fries on SBMARUF
channel.description: Recent content in Jason Alan Fries on SBMARUF

item.title: PromptSource: An Integrated Development Environment and Repository for Natural Language Prompts
item.description: Over 2,000 prompts for roughly 170 datasets are available through PromptSource framework.

item.title: Multitask Prompted Training Enables Zero-Shot Task Generalization
item.description: T0 shows zero-shot task generalization on English natural language prompts, outperforming GPT-3 on many tasks, while being 16x smaller!
